item.title: [PI] Dung Skill
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

I’ve made an dung minigame, almost done, but now i need to add a skill for Dungoneering, i already added the xp that it gives from killing the boss. The ID is 21, and i need a command for it, can’t think of how it would look like.

Here’s the start of the command

if (playerCommand.equals("dlevel") || playerCommand.equals("Dlevel")) { c.sendMessage("Your Dungeoneering level is "+

And here’s my playerSave Skills, how would i make this Save 21 too?

/*SKILLS*/ characterfile.write("[SKILLS]", 0, 8); characterfile.newLine(); for (int i = 0; i < p.playerLevel.length; i++) { characterfile.write("character-skill = ", 0, 18); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(i), 0, Integer.toString(i).length()); characterfile.write(" ", 0, 1); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.playerLevel[i]), 0, Integer.toString(p.playerLevel[i]).length()); characterfile.write(" ", 0, 1); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.playerXP[i]), 0, Integer.toString(p.playerXP[i]).length()); characterfile.newLine(); } characterfile.newLine();

Read full topic
